entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -42.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 9:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -42.3°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -46.9°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill near minus 59. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 47 with temperature rising to minus 42 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 47 with temperature rising to minus 42 by morning. Wind chill minus 65 in the evening and minus 58 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
